The U: S. did not refuse test kits from the WHO, as stated by Biden, as confirmed by Dr. Deborah Birx and Adm. Brett Giroir, members of the coronavirus task force.
Mike Ryan: the executive director of the WHO's Health Emergencies Programme, clarified that the WHO did not offer tests to the U.S. as it was aware of the U.S.'s domestic testing capacity and its ability to develop its own tests.
